I don't usually write reviews, but this place, out of the hundreds I've been to throughout the world, is by far, the simplest and most delicious food I've had for under 10€ - a full meal I might add... With dessert! How can you go wrong? I promise that if your experience is anything like mine, the host will be as courteous and helpful as possible and you'll have an amazing meal soon after. Enjoy! I know I did.
